resources.string: To record your daily wellness check use the record button. \nYou will be asked a question and we will record your answer! \nOur app uses AI to determine your happiness score based on your answer.
In the stats page we will record your dialy happiness score and broadcast this back to you to show your progress!
This page will play back your weekly diary entries so you can see your progress over time!

Welcome to CPA wellness app! 
Record Diary 
To record your daily wellness check use the record button. 
You will be asked a question and we will record your answer! Our app uses AI to determine your happiness score based on your answer. 
Stats 
In the stats page we will record your dialy happiness score and broadcast this back to you to show your progress! 
Diary 
This page will play back your weekly diary entries so you can see your progress over time!
